hooks.command: if [ -f "${file}" ]; then if command -v prettier &> /dev/null; then npx prettier --write "${file}" 2>/dev/null || true; elif command -v black &> /dev/null && [[ "${file}" == *.py ]]; then black "${file}" 2>/dev/null || true; fi; fi
if [ "${file}" == "package.json" ]; then npm install 2>/dev/null || pnpm install 2>/dev/null || bun install 2>/dev/null || true; fi

if [ "${file}" == "requirements.txt" ] || [ "${file}" == "pyproject.toml" ] || [ "${file}" == "Pipfile" ]; then pip install -r requirements.txt 2>/dev/null || poetry install 2>/dev/null || pipenv install 2>/dev/null || true; fi
if [ "${file}" == "go.mod" ] || [ "${file}" == "go.sum" ]; then go mod download 2>/dev/null || true; fi
if [ "${file}" == "Cargo.toml" ]; then cargo fetch 2>/dev/null || true; fi
